title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Parts (a) and (b) are read together, so points may be earned for part (a) if written in part (b).
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Notes:

· Multiple measurements earns third point. Student must clearly state what quantity is varied to earn both third and fourth point.

· If using photogates to determine dart speed, then distance between the photogates OR the length of the dart must be measured by a meter stick.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes three of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: Many combinations of quantities exist to graph and earn the point.

student can ONLY get credit for c if these parts use quantities first measured in (a) and/or (b).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note:

· Parts (c) and (d) are read together. Points in (d) rely on (c).

· If student incorrectly identifies feature of graph stated in part (c) may still earn full credit in part (d).

· "slope" only acceptable (1st point) if there is a linear relationship between the graphed quantities (like F vs x is ok with "slope" but not v vs t)
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Note: An explanation is not needed to earn the point.
